Definition: Count of hubs that meet the following conditions: Shared ECHO attendance data since 2003,
Count  of hubs that meet 2 out of 3 conditions: 1. launch date in Salesforce, 2. valid program name in Salesforce, and 3. shared attendance data since 2003
Count of hubs that have operated one or more ECHO sessions during chosen time period
Count of all attendances at ECHO programs, where attendee type is attendee. Includes anonymous attendees where applicable.
Count of  ECHO attendees (Due to different attendance platforms this may be difficult to obtain accurate number)
Count of  ECHO attendees provided derived ratio of attendee to sessions attended
Count of  ECHO programs with attendance data
Count of active ECHO programs in Salesforce
Count of  ECHO sessions that have been conducted. Excludes canceled sessions, sessions occuring at a future date.
